job_description:
• , 4+ years of relevant biotechnology or pharmaceutical industry experience.
• Experience in a process or product development role, especially technology transfer to manufacturing and/or QC groups.
• Proficient in standard molecular biology techniques such as sample preparation, nucleic acid amplification and purification (RNA/DNA), and DNA/RNA in situ hybridization experience.
• Light and fluorescent microscopy experience.
• Experience with experimental design and statistical data analysis.
• Experience troubleshooting molecular biology-based assays and issues with reagent quality (manufacturing process, QC and stability).
• Experience generating reports/presentations and forecasting reagent usage and costs.
• Strong collaboration and communication skills.

• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to meet software engineering requirements.
• The ideal candidate will have experience in Microchip firmware (MPLAB, Harmony), embedded Linux (ARM SoCs, Quartus), C++ GUI development with Qt, and networking (TCP/UDP).
• You'll translate customer needs into technical solutions and support project development end-to-end.
• Security clearance eligibility required (DoD preferred).
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to meet software engineering requirements.
• Advanced Software Engr Locations Atlanta, GA, United States (Hybrid) Posting Date09/22/2025 Trending Software Engineer & Computer Science - Recent Grad/Full Time Locations United States Posting Date08/29/2025 Trending As a Recent Graduate here at Honeywell, you will have the opportunity to kickstart your career by working alongside experienced professionals in a dynamic and innovative environment.
• Software Engineer & Computer Science - Summer 2026 Intern (US Person Required) Locations United States Posting Date08/29/2025 Trending Through hands-on learning experiences, global exposure, networking, and professional development opportunities, Honeywell interns will shape the future.
• You’ll have the opportunity to work alongside industry experts, lead initiatives that refine technical skills, and have unparalleled mentorship and growth opportunities that will elevate your career.
